answers.answer: Please, give me a quick review instead

speech: Today at 08.20 am, we've been alarmed that the 4th floor of the Doom Research company building has been taken by an unidentified suspect. On that floor is located the Bacteriological Research Department, which is comprised by a series of isolated lab chambers.
Uhmm... apparently the building has an emergency quarantine system, which was activated at 08.07 am, provoking the automated lock of every chamber, as so with the elevators and the emergency stairs.

The company reports that following the standard security protocol, every personnel was evacuated from the 1st, 2nd and 3rd floor. According to the manifesto, there are still 9 remaining employees locked in the 4th floor.

answers.answer: I see, is there any way to unlock the 4th floor?
Is there any kind of biochemical danger in the building?

speech: Even though the quarantine system is active, Doom Research systems indicate no traces of chemical or hazardous material of any sort in the building
This means the system was triggered by the suspect. The bad news is that the only way to deactivate a manual activation is overriding the system from the inside of the floor

After a quick analysis of the floorplans, the SWAT team reached the conclusion that breaking into the floor without knowing the inner situation could produce collateral damage, risking the employees lives

answers.answer: Yeah, so that's why you called me

speech: Not quite. The SWAT team is making some alternative analysis of the situation as we speak.
But we made some attempts to communicate with the suspect. At 08.43 am a male voice answered the 4-C lab phone.
He stated that he'll only talk with a negotiator from outside the local police force. So that's why you're here.
You have to talk to the individual inside the building. That way we may prevent unnecesary collateral damage.
